pricing_notes: Enterprise pricing requires contacting sales for a quote.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Automatically uncover insights in your customer calls and interviews. Share effortlessly with your team.
features: Automatic summarization
Highlights key moments
Auto tags highlights
Auto-import and store calls, docs, and survey responses
Transcribe conversations in over 40 languages, and detect speakers
Save highlights across video, audio, documents, and notes
Share auto-generated highlights with your team via Slack, Notion, and more

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Instantly discover insights across all your customer touch points like calls, surveys and support channels.
features: Global semantic search
Thematic classification
Auto creates insights
Ask your data and insights anything
AI summarized results linked to real customer feedback
Customize your workspace with folders, filters, and views
Create project overviews and share in-depth findings as insights
Store, track, and recruit over 3m people to talk to, worldwide

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Scale insights org-wide with Enterprise-grade features, access controls, and standardization.
features: Chat with your data in Slack
Automated insights digests
Video, audio, and text redaction
Discover insights with conversational AI in Slack and Microsoft Teams
Configure automated text and audio digests with relevant updates
Redact video, audio, and text within transcripts to protect privacy
Control permissions with user roles, groups, and granular access control
Standardize tags, fields, and templates across the workspace
Enable stakeholders to self-service insights with homepage and search

additional_fees.fee_description: Set up research studies and source new participants from our pool of 3 million people.

original_app_metadata.name: Dovetail
original_app_metadata.description: Dovetail lets you organize user research data, analyze it together, and share insights with your team. Understand your customers with Dovetail and build better things.
